message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. Given its significance to you, I understand its worth stands at $1000000. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you this exceptional item for $950000. This price reflects a strategic balance, allowing me to ensure a fair return while providing you with a substantial saving compared to its full value. I believe this proposal presents an attractive proposition and a win-win situation for both of us. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.
